name: Freeze Ray
description: You shoot three, heatseaking rays of frigid energy at up to three targets within a moderate (20 unit) distance. Each ray deals 7 cold damage if the target fails a defense check of 8. If a single target takes more than 20 cold damage they must make a resilience check of 8 or become frozen until the end of their next turn.
charge: Minions and grunts become frozen if they take any cold damage from one of the rays.
